[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]

Educational System

[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334552444{margin-bottom: 10px !important;background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-2-1.png?id=541) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609334955491{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

Step 1 (Phase I):

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609332766805{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]The1st, 2 nd, and 3rd classes are included in this phase. After completion of these classes, all the students are aware of the basic tenets of Islam and are able to perform obligatory acts of worship. After learning the rules of Urdu and English languages, students can easily make sentences and it increases their reading skills as well. We pay special attention to the basic principles of science and mathematics, too. Conjugation (Gardaan) is done on a daily basis.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16299″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334624333{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16301″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Step 2 (Phase II):

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609332823956{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]In this phase, after studying in class 4, 5, and 6, in one year, under the supervision of expert teachers, students are able to write essays, letters, and sermons in the English and Urdu languages along with the informative knowledge of ‘Uswa-e-Hasanah’. Additionally, our students can maintain their progress in Algebraic and modern Sciences. Alongside, they become experts in the recitation of the Holy Quran, reading, debates, and speeches as well. In this phase, we pay special attention to Hifz-e-Quran with Tajweed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334687456{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Step 3 (Phase III):

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609333008167{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]In this phase, students become confident enough (after studying class 7 and 8), to find work on their own. We fully focus on character building of our students so they can assist their elders in carrying out social affairs. We also arrange different competitions to increase the creativity level of our students. Competitions are also held throughout the year among students with correct conjugation (Gardaan) and recitation of the Quran.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16302″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334729073{margin-bottom: 10px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16303″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609334746944{background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-3-1.png?id=544) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}”]

Step 4 (Phase IV):

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609334792739{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]Each student is individually focused on during this phase and prepared for class 9 according to the syllabus of Karachi Board of Education. In this regard, latest computer labs & science labs are also used for higher education –under the supervision of well-educated teachers. Even at this level, there is a continuous flow of conjugation (Gardaan) and extra-curricular activities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334805695{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Step 5 (Phase V):

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609333044428{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]In this phase, experienced and hardworking teachers pay special attention towards students to enhance their skills and abilities. After checking their written and oral skills, they are taken to the labs and workshops for acquiring practical skills. This helps them play a positive role in the society as a responsible citizen and knowledgeable Muslim by achieving success at a better level. Compared to the previous phases, we pay special attention to conjugation (Gardaan).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16304″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-vz-jquery” bg_image_new=”id^2112|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Idara-Maarif-Docu-for-Mobile-012.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^Idara Maarif Docu for Mobile 012|description^null” bg_img_attach=”fixed” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”#000000″ overlay_pattern=”01.png” overlay_pattern_opacity=”90″ overlay_pattern_attachment=”fixed” css=”.vc_custom_1609336482557{background-color: #000000 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Highlighted Features

Completion of Primary education in just 3 years.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”2/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1609116831363{margin-left: 10px !important;}”]
Education up to Matriculation in a purely religious environment
Provision of Oxford syllabus for English, Mathematics, and science.
Best system for English and Urdu handwriting.
Ethical and practical training in social affairs.
[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1609118174473{background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/aims-and-objectives-web.png?id=12794) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/5″]
Easy Urdu with elegance of Islam.
Easy theology with Hadith and Sunnah of Rasool (Peace be upon him).
Conjugation (Gardaan) of the Quran.
Extra-curricular activities (Hamd, Naat, Debates).
[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]

Facilities

Professional & Experienced Teachers

Special attention to character building.

Standby generators

Science lab with latest facilities

Canteen

Religious environment

Latest computer lab

!important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Examination System

There are at least three utterly important exams in annual courses. Each exam is approximately one-third of the reviewed section. In addition, exams are held in such criteria: the first exam syllabus includes the first 15 volumes, the second exam includes last 15 volumes, and the whole Quran is appraised in final examination. Students must score a minimum of 50% marks to pass these exams; marks less than 50% are considered a failing grade. Computerized reports of results are handed over to the parents.
In addition, it is necessary for teachers to take monthly tests. A student’s record is compiled after getting the signature of his/her parents and this record is presented at the parent teacher meeting. Half lineage is tested before ‘Preliminary exams’ of the students of class 9 & 10.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609365739175{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Admission Process

Al-Ma’arif High School was primarily established for Hifz-e-Quran. Therefore, Hifz-e-Quran with authentic documents is the very 1st condition of admission.
At the time of admission students should be 13 years old for admission in phase I,
14 years old for phase II, and 16 years old for phase III.
Completion of admission is based on two essential assessments:

>Memorization of Quran (Remember well)
>Passing the admission test for required class with considerable marks.

It is necessary to bring the following documents (Original) with you and to submit a copy of all these documents mentioned below.
Legal certificate of memorization (Hifz), Previous school/madrasa’s certificate, Guardian’s CNIC, Latest 4 passport size photos.
Signing the form of rules and regulations made by the institute to improve the system.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″ css=”.vc_custom_1609248903073{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609365838168{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Educational Fee

Annual fee: Rs.4000
Admission fee: Rs.4000
Monthly fee: Rs.3500
Note: Fee will increase by 10% every year.

Pay school fee and other dues on time. 15% discount will be given in case of submission of 12 months fee altogether. 10% discount will be given in case of submission of 6 months fee altogether, and a 5% discount will be given in case of submission of 3 months fee altogether. Parents will be called in if the fee is not paid till the 7th of every month as students will not be allowed to sit in the class. Students with 100% attendance will get a 50% discount next year’s annual fee. Annual fee will be waived for the best academic performance in annual examinations.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609366036906{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Transportation

Transportation is not the responsibility of the institute.

Parents are responsible for arranging transportation themselves.

However, the management of the institution will definitely assist in such matters.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” gap=”20″ bg_type=”bg_color” ult_hide_row=”ult_hide_row_value” ult_hide_row_large_screen=”large_screen” ult_hide_row_desktop=”desktop” css=”.vc_custom_1609367252405{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” bg_color_value=”#b1650d”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1609366535813{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Examination System

There are at least three utterly important exams in annual courses. Each exam is approximately one-third of the reviewed section. In addition, exams are held in such criteria: the first exam syllabus includes the first 15 volumes, the second exam includes last 15 volumes, and the whole Quran is appraised in final examination. Students must score a minimum of 50% marks to pass these exams; marks less than 50% are considered a failing grade. Computerized reports of results are handed over to the parents.
In addition, it is necessary for teachers to take monthly tests. A student’s record is compiled after getting the signature of his/her parents and this record is presented at the parent teacher meeting. Half lineage is tested before ‘Preliminary exams’ of the students of class 9 & 10.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1609366535813{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Admission Process

Al-Ma’arif High School was primarily established for Hifz-e-Quran. Therefore, Hifz-e-Quran with authentic documents is the very 1st condition of admission.
At the time of admission students should be 13 years old for admission in phase I,
14 years old for phase II, and 16 years old for phase III.
Completion of admission is based on two essential assessments:

>Memorization of Quran (Remember well)
>Passing the admission test for required class with considerable marks.

It is necessary to bring the following documents (Original) with you and to submit a copy of all these documents mentioned below.
Legal certificate of memorization (Hifz), Previous school/madrasa’s certificate, Guardian’s CNIC, Latest 4 passport size photos.
Signing the form of rules and regulations made by the institute to improve the system.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1609365838168{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Educational Fee

Annual fee: Rs.3000
Admission fee: Rs.300
Monthly fee: Rs.3200
Note: Fee will increase by 10% every year.

Pay school fee and other dues on time. 15% discount will be given in case of submission of 12 months fee altogether. 10% discount will be given in case of submission of 6 months fee altogether, and a 5% discount will be given in case of submission of 3 months fee altogether. Parents will be called in if the fee is not paid till the 7th of every month as students will not be allowed to sit in the class. Students with 100% attendance will get a 50% discount next year’s annual fee. Annual fee will be waived for the best academic performance in annual examinations.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1609365838168{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Transportation

Transportation is not the responsibility of the institute.

Parents are responsible for arranging transportation themselves.

However, the management of the institution will definitely assist in such matters.

excerpt.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334552444{margin-bottom: 10px !important;background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-2-1.png?id=541) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609334955491{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609332766805{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]The1st, 2 nd, and 3rd classes are included in this phase. After completion of these classes, all the students are aware of the basic tenets of Islam and are able to perform obligatory acts of worship. After learning the rules of Urdu and English languages, students can easily make sentences and it increases their reading skills as well. We pay special attention to the basic principles of science and mathematics, too. Conjugation (Gardaan) is done on a daily basis.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16299″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334624333{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16301″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609332823956{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]In this phase, after studying in class 4, 5, and 6, in one year, under the supervision of expert teachers, students are able to write essays, letters, and sermons in the English and Urdu languages along with the informative knowledge of ‘Uswa-e-Hasanah’. Additionally, our students can maintain their progress in Algebraic and modern Sciences. Alongside, they become experts in the recitation of the Holy Quran, reading, debates, and speeches as well. In this phase, we pay special attention to Hifz-e-Quran with Tajweed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334687456{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609333008167{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]In this phase, students become confident enough (after studying class 7 and 8), to find work on their own. We fully focus on character building of our students so they can assist their elders in carrying out social affairs. We also arrange different competitions to increase the creativity level of our students. Competitions are also held throughout the year among students with correct conjugation (Gardaan) and recitation of the Quran.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16302″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334729073{margin-bottom: 10px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16303″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609334746944{background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-3-1.png?id=544) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: […]
